destiny_player: CREATE TABLE destiny_players ( player_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY generated by default as identity, bungie_net_id INTEGER UNIQUE NOT NULL, display_name TEXT NOT NULL, display_name_code SMALLINT NOT NULL, password TEXT NOT NULL, salt BYTEA UNIQUE, account_type SMALLINT NOT NULL, account_creation TIMESTAMP);
admin_passwords: CREATE TABLE admin_passwords ( admin_id INTEGER UNIQUE NOT NULL REFERENCES destiny_players(player_id) ON DELETE RESTRICT, endpoint_password TEXT NULL);
